jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
Samuel jumps out and grabs his daughter (as a joke)
A sudden cut to Samuel banging on a car wheel with a tire iron may startle some viewers
A broken doll falls to the ground
Samuel grabs Janice’s hand as she goes to open a door
A shutter slides back up startling Sister Charlotte
Linda sees the doll which, accompanied by a loud noise, suddenly disappears into the darkness
The demon suddenly appears inside the tent and puts her hand on the face of one of the girls
The girl at the window turns around to reveal a demonic face
After several seconds silence, Janice is suddenly pulled off her chair into the air by an unseen force
Janice falls back to the ground
The toy gun is suddenly pulled out of Linda’s hand
Janice’s wheelchair is hit by an unseen force
Janice’s wheelchair is flung away from Janice’s outstretched hand
Bee suddenly begins crawling towards Janice
Hands come out of the well and pull Linda into it
Linda is suddenly pulled across the ground
After the scarecrow disappears, Kate suddenly bangs on the truck door scaring the girls inside
There is a loud bang on the door as Linda tries to open the window
After several seconds of silence, a hand comes from off screen to break the lightbulb beside Carol
There are several loud bangs on the door
Esther’s torso suddenly comes to life and chases after Linda
Janice suddenly bursts into the room where Linda is hiding
Annabelle suddenly appears at the door to her parents bedroom
A train roars past startling Peter
Elizabeth’s hand slams on the window
The door-bell buzzes
There is a loud bang and the lights go out on the train, a few seconds later Erica’s face suddenly becomes grotesque and she screams at Peter
A disfigured man suddenly appears behind Peter
Elizabeth suddenly bangs on the window that Peter is standing in front of
A door slams behind Peter
Elizabeth runs at Peter and attacks him
A bird suddenly flaps at the window and flies away
Accompanied by a thump, a hand-print suddenly appears on the window
Elizabeth bangs on the window as young Peter watches
William sees Elizabeth float through the front of the car screaming at him
William sees Elizabeth in the rear view mirror
William turns around and Elizabeth screams at him once more
A girl is pulled away by an evil entity. This is used a few times in the movie so it won’t be terrifying or startling

After a couple seconds of silence and buildup, the possessed and demonic Claire runs with a knife in front of the camera and her sister. This is probably the most effective jump scare since it was somewhat unexpected
The elevator making a loud noise might startle some viewers. Not that something particularly frightening is happening, just the noise is quite startling
Claire is pulled away by an evil entity
Claire is attacked by an entity
A door slams
The old lady is pulled by the evil force
An evil entity suddenly runs at the main character in the mirror
Margaret gets up from the floor carrying a knife
A man knocks on Emily’s car window while she’s focused on something else
A dog jumps at a window and starts to bark
Emily turns around to go back inside and is startled by Lily standing in the door-frame
Margaret’s dishevelled face appears at her cell window
Emily sees Lily’s feet as she searches for a screw
There is a loud bang on Emily’s bedroom door
A disfigured Margaret appears from between the clothes in Emily’s closet. [Video]
Lily grabs Emily’s hand
Lily’s hand punches through the tail light to grab Emily
An insect raises its legs, and briefly afterwards it suddenly jumps towards Yuki while hissing
Several screeching bats fly towards Yuki
A swarm of flying insects fly at Yuki as she is going down some stairs
Yuki looks around the corner and her father is standing right in front of her face
Yuki is grabbed on the leg while climbing
A bird flies into the window of Charlie’s classroom however we see the bird flying towards the window beforehand which substantially reduces the impact
We see a decapitated head on the road crawling with ants (not a jump scare but some viewers might find the image disturbing)
As Annie drives home from the seance she is startled by the tongue-clicking noise that her daughter makes
After the seance at home, Peter starts to freak out however this is interrupted when a glass cabinet suddenly breaks
Shortly after Annie says “Charlie, what’s wrong?” the candle on the table flares up
Peter thinks he sees Charlie in the corner of the room but it turns out to be a ball that drops and rolls across the floor. After a short pause, an arm suddenly grabs Peter around the head
Peter hears a loud noise from upstairs

During a very tense scene, Peter sees a naked man in the doorway. He then looks up to the ceiling where Annie previously was but no one is there. Suddenly, Annie rushes at him from the corner of the room
David has a brief flashback which causes him to wake up
A cat jumps out of the closet
Emily shows Amy her doll, which now has a mutilated face
Accompanied by a “jump scare” sound effect, the lights turn off
There is a loud bang as the generator kicks back on
David pulls a dead cat out of the bath
Elizabeth opens the closet and screams as she sees something
There is a bang on the door
The camera pans around David to reveal Stephen standing behind him
David parts the curtain and sees Stephen standing outside
Accompanied by a “jump scare” sound effect, the lights turn off
The sheriff closes the closet door and is attacked by David
David surprises Katherine
The seemingly dead sheriff suddenly grabs Elizabeth’s arm
David shines the torch on Katherine and calls her name
David turns the torch back on and Katherine is standing in front of him holding a gun

movies.title: Ju On: The Beginning of The End

jump_scares.spoiler: As one of the authorities looks around his surroundings, a ghostly boy suddenly appears in front of him as the camera looks down
A light behind the high school girl suddenly flickers as she turns around and sees the ghostly boy for a few brief seconds
A closet door to the high school girl’s right abruptly begins to rattle
As a teacher briefly looks around the house, she spots a woman standing ominously
After the teacher hears some noises, she turns around only to see the ominous woman standing behind her
A close-up of the ominous woman’s face is accompanied by a somewhat loud sound
A piano note is suddenly heard
As a distressed girl looks through the puddle of blood, she notices two hands on her shoulders in the reflection from the blood
The microwave suddenly begins to make strange noises
A high school girl’s suddenly dragged by a mysterious force
As the teacher moves closer to the TV, a boy’s face suddenly appears on it
A ghostly woman’s eyes suddenly opens
The ghostly woman is suddenly seen on the ceiling
After the teacher slowly looks to her right she notices the ghostly woman right beside her
As the teacher slowly turns, she notices the ghost of her husband walk towards her
A ghostly boy’s hand is seen holding a woman’s waist
A ghostly boy’s face is seen underneath a glass table
As a man reaches for a newspaper on the floor, a hand suddenly grabs his arm
As a woman looks through a strange notebook, she closes it and sees a pale woman on the reflection of the glass table
As a hospitalized little girl looks at another house through her window, she notices a ghostly boy pass by
A man’s voice suddenly distorts
A woman suddenly appears in a closet
As a girl picks up a picture frame, the faces of the two people on the image suddenly appear distorted
As the hospitalized little girl looks through her window again, the ghostly boy appears again (yet this time on the balcony of the other house
An abrupt cut to a moving train is made
A screaming boy suddenly appears as the lights flicker
As a girl moves over and lifts the table cloth to look under the table again, she sees a ghostly boy sitting under it
As a mother and daughter talk to each other, a ghostly woman suddenly rushes over to the door
After a flashback scene plays, the man suddenly transitions back to the present
As the elevator door opens, it reveals many versions of the ghostly boy inside of it
The principal suddenly closes the blinds as Gary stares at Lucas
Karl startles Gary by putting his hand on Gary’s back
Gary closes the fridge door to reveal Lucas sitting on the kitchen table
When Gary looks back at the swing Lucas is gone (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Gary suddenly shines the torch into an empty room
One of the toys in Lucas’s room begins talking
Gary looks through a hole int he door and the goat puppet suddenly appears
William runs at the car from the side of the screen and bangs on the window to scare Ben
William suddenly bangs on the car window to scare the kids outside
William shines the flashlight on a taxidermy wolf with a loud sound cue
A doll suddenly moves on its own, turning towards the group and startling them
A sudden loud noise startles Ben
There is a sudden scream that startles Deborah
Ben suddenly lunges forward to attack William
Deborah suddenly appears behind William and grabs him while screaming
Anna quickly lifts her head up while Lucie is looking at her
Anna, looking down, suddenly lunges at and grabs Lucie
A seemingly dead Deborah springs back up
There is a loud noise and Dennis falls flat
As the camera zooms in on Kristi the power suddenly cuts out
A ball is thrown at the camera
Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar
Something flies out of the pool
Leila appears in front of the camera
The bathroom mirror cracks
The dark entity flies at the camera
A figure suddenly rushes at the camera accompanied by a loud noise
Something falls down in front of the camera, startling Emily
Leila suddenly walks in on Ryan and Mike who are looking at camera footage
A Santa toy suddenly turns on
Emma begins talking behind Ryan
Something bangs on the bedroom window
A dark entity bursts through the window behind Emily
Leila suddenly attacks Father Todd
The dark entity rushes past the camera
A toy turns on
The entity whooshes past the camera
An abrupt camera change may startle some viewers
The dark entity can briefly be seen as Leila’s bedroom door suddenly closes
Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall
The entity suddenly strangles and drags away Father Todd
A hand impales Ryan through the chest
Emily turns the camera night vision on and Katie is shown to be standing in front of the camera
Emily turns around to see Leila watching her
Toby’s foot lands in front of the camera
The camera abruptly cuts off
A ghostly hand reaches out of the TV to meet Carol’s hand
Carol’s hand comes up from the bottom of the screen to pull at her mother
A giant tree smashes through the window of the children’s bedroom
The mother opens the bathroom door to a loud noise
A giant skull comes out of the doorway
The clown toy appears suddenly and drags Robbie under the bed
The scene abruptly cuts back to Robbie under the bed with the clown toy
A skull comes out of the water behind the wife
A skeleton lands on the wind-shield of the family car
A truck drives by startling Rachel after she says “everything is inside”
The injured man grabs Louis around the arm as he wheels him into theater
The lights flicker and the previously dead man is suddenly sitting up on the bed behind Louis
Louis sits in his car lost in thought  as he goes to drive off a truck suddenly races past in front of him
Victor’s hand suddenly reaches out to grab Louis around the ankle as he climbs the pile of branches
During a flashback, young Rachel is startled as her disfigured sister suddenly falls down the dumbwaiter shaft
Louis opens the closet revealing Church who screeches at him
Ellie is suddenly scratched by the cat as she tries to remove something from its fur
Church screeches at Louis from behind
After Louis walks through a door and finds himself back outside in the woods, a truck horn suddenly blares
Rachel has a hallucination where the medicine cabinet in the bathroom transforms into the dumbwaiter shaft which her sister once again falls through
After Louis finds the mask, Ellie appears behind him and says “Daddy”
Jud spots Church in the hallway and suddenly Ellie stabs him in the ankle
After waking from a nightmare Rachel looks up to find Gage safe. Suddenly Ellie leaps at her with a knife
A shadow movies behind Ellison
Trevor begins screaming while coming out of a box
A loud bang startles Ellison
There is a loud banging noise while Ellison is in the attic
Ellison lifts a box lid to uncover a snake
Ellison falls through the attic floor. [Video]
Bughuul’s face on Ellison’s laptop begins to move
Ellison lowers the print of Bughuul’s face only to see the same face mirrored in the backyard outside. [Video]
Ellison sees Trevor’s face hiding in the bushes
Several deceased children are seen standing behind Ellison
A tied up body suddenly comes into view in front of lawnmower. [Video]
A deceased girl appears beside Ellison. [Video]
A deceased girl in a yellow coat appears in the hallway
A deceased girl sits beside Ashley’s bed
Bughuul’s face suddenly appears in front of Ellison while he is peering into the attic. [Video]
A box labelled home movies drops from the attic and lands on the floor beside Ellison
Bughuul’s face abruptly drops into view, just before the final credits roll. [Video]
The dead janitor, Colin, begins to crawl out of the toilet in the school bathroom
Rose screams loudly
Cybil moves in front of Rose and she drops the torch
A giant knife pierces the wall, almost hitting Rose and Cybil
An arm comes through the hole in the wall
Birds fly out of a pit
The nurses twitch as Rose walks between them
The blender suddenly starts spinning while Stephanie has her hand in it
We hear the creature growl from outside the tent
There is a flash of lightning and the boy in the doorway starts to jerk unnaturally
Stephanie stands in a rotting pumpkin
Accompanied by a sound effect, Stephanie sees a dead animal on the table
The washing machine suddenly turns on
A flash of lightning reveals a silhouette by the window
Stephanie reaches up to grab her mother’s hand but she suddenly lets out a cry of anger and brushes some papers off her desk
From under the water, Stephanie suddenly has a vision of her father lunging at her
Something smashes into the window beside Stephanie
The door slams after Stephanie says “Dad”
The doorknob rattles as Stephanie reaches out to touch it
Stephanie’s father bangs the spade on the ground
A door opens loudly
After Stephanie’s mother says “come on, its clear” she is pulled away by an unseen force
The chandelier suddenly drops from the ceiling and smashes into the table
As Stephanie’s father says “princess” he is pushed into the window by an unseen force
As Stephanie descends the stairs, her mother slams into the wall behind her
A loud gunshot during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
The woman on the bed turns her head suddenly and says “what did you do”
The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
The Lutz family suddenly appear in front of Lorraine
Lorraine looks back at the mirror and the nun is standing right behind her reflection, she looks away and looks back once more and the nun is now right in front of her. [Video]
Janet starts talking in a much deeper voice
Janet starts talking again and is revealed to be standing directly in front of Margaret’s bed
A man’s voice roars loudly. [Video]
A telephone rings during a quiet scene
Janet sees a reflection on the television of a man sitting on a chair
The man now appears behind Janet and he screams “my house”. [Video]
Janet wakes from her sleep as she crashes to the floor
A man yells and the bed sheets are pulled off Janet’s bed
The bedside cabinet suddenly slides across the room
A tape player suddenly turns on during a tense scene
After putting her hands around the painting the nun suddenly runs at Lorraine. [Video]
Bill shouts Janet’s name and attacks her. [Video]
Through an opening in the door Peggy sees Janet be pulled away and replaced with Bill
Peggy looks down and sees Bill’s face in the water. He reaches out and grabs Peggy’s arm
Janet reappears in the kitchen holding a knife
The nun puts her hand on Bill’s shoulder. [Video]
Ed looks up from the turntable and sees the crooked man looking at him
Loud rattling noises coming from the ceiling can be heard periodically over the next 30-40 seconds
More rattling noises come from the ceiling
Karl startles Chris while she is in the attic
Regan sees a demon appear for a brief moment
The scene abruptly cuts to Regan screaming
Regan spider-walks down the stairs with blood coming from her mouth
The possessed Regan vomits green liquid over Father Karras
The phone rings loudly
There is a loud moan from the upstairs bedroom
Regan sits up in bed and attacks Father Karras from behind
The house begins to shake violently
Bobby is suddenly grabbed on the shoulder by a deformed looking hand
Bobby’s apartment door suddenly shuts off on its own
While Bobby is leaning down to grab the coins, the laundry machine suddenly goes off on its own
Bobby is suddenly grabbed by bloody hands and dragged away
While the man throws his trash down the chute, he is grabbed
Bobby opens his eyes and sees a ghost woman floating above him
A box of pins suddenly drops down on a chair
The apartment door shuts off on its own
Carly is grabbed from behind and dragged into the darkness
A hand knocks out the garbage bag
The woman suddenly takes the hand of Detective Muldoon
After the radio has tuned out, a girl is suddenly standing on the street
After the monster looks out of the bathtub Peter suddenly hits the window pane and frightens his wife
The monster suddenly jumps up from the edge of the bed. This happens with an extremely loud sound effect
Detective Muldoon is pushed into the sink from behind
Goodman’s colleague shoots himself off-screen. The sound is very startling
When Goodman’s colleague in the car turns around again, a screaming woman knocks on the car window. This is very startling
The camera pans to the left where suddenly a zombie stands in the light cone
Hands suddenly come out of the bathtub and reach for Peter
Peter turns around and suddenly the dead woman stands in front of him and screams at him
Suddenly the screaming ghost appears in the left corner of the cupboard
A screaming ghost appears over Faith. The sound effect is very sudden
A screaming ghost appears in the car behind Lorna
When Detective Muldoon turns off the light, a ghost appears before her
The ghost appears once again
The ghost suddenly opens the door
Just after the son runs into the dark corner of the room, the female ghost comes out of it shortly after and murmurs to Detective Muldoon
After it turns out that it is not Muldoon’s real son in her arms, the screaming spirit of a child suddenly appears in her arms
Sarah shines her light on Chris behind a tree, who quickly moves away accompanied by a sound cue
Noreen suddenly bangs her hands on the car window
As Sarah approaches Noreen laying down on the ground, there is a cut to Noreen’s body with a sound cue
Chris slowly lays his hand on the floor, and then suddenly hisses and quickly reaches out to grab the spider
While Chris is touching Sarah’s scar, he suddenly begins to push down on it
There is a sudden cut from a quiet scene to Sarah sitting between a clapping audience
The lights cut out, and when they turn back on, Chris’ face looks rotten and he grunts at Sarah
While the lights are flickering, Chris suddenly opens his eyes and shrieks
A hand suddenly reaches out from the darkness and grabs Sarah
Mrs. Baylock attacks Robert from behind as he stands over Damien’s bed. [Video]
Benigna is revealed in the shed behind Laura accompanied by a startling sound
There is a loud crash as Laura listens against the wall
A presumably dead Benigna grabs Laura’s arm. [Video]
A window slides shut suddenly and breaks
A child’s hand grabs Laura from behind. [Video]
A hand slams the door closed
A shadow flies past Laura as she walks down the stairs
A hand appears at the entrance to the well
Rachel unzips the body bag to reveal Jake’s horribly contorted face
As Rachel zips up the body bag, Samara’s arm suddenly grabs her. [Video
Samara briefly flashes up on the screen
A deer smashes through the car window beside Rachel. [Video
Rachel attempts to pull Aidan from the bathtub but he has been replaced by Samara
Aidan grabs Rachel’s arm
As Rachel goes to open a door, it is suddenly opened on the other side
Aidan comes up behind Rachel and hugs her
Max slumps back in the drivers seat to reveal a horribly contorted face
Samara surfaces from the well once more
A loud thump comes from the box as a lady reaches out to touch it
A bandaged lady suddenly slams on the window, startling Em
A small creature suddenly races out of the dog door
Hannah opens the bathroom cupboard and a large number of moths fly out
We see a hand coming out of Em’s throat as she looks inside her mouth with a torch
A book suddenly flies out of Clyde’s hand as he reads to Em
Stephanie bursts into the room
Tzadok suddenly breaks the glass on the box
Em suddenly drops down in front of Clyde as he notices blood dripping on his hand
A truck suddenly slams into a car
As Kate searches for Flora in the barn, something pops in the background
Kate suddenly finds herself in front of a horse that is being flushed out. The horse is not visible beforehand, a cheap thrill for no reason
As Kate tries to close the window, a ghost suddenly appears in the reflection. Very effective
Kate turns around and suddenly a mannequin is standing by her door
The sewing machine suddenly turns on as Kate leaves the room
A spider comes out of the ground and eats the ant
Kate jumps into the water as she thinks she sees Flora drowning. Shortly before Kate reaches the person under water she grabs her and screams
Kate dives in the tub when you recognize Miles Silhouette. Two seconds later a loud bang sounds for no reason
There is a figure in the mirror
Kate gets the flashlight ripped from her hand
Kate turns around and a mannequin stands behind her
A hand comes out of the water and pulls Kate in
Quint is suddenly visible in the rear view mirror of the car
A sudden loud noise startles the detective
The detective reaches in towards a plant, and Katie’s pet bird suddenly flies out from it
Katie’s bird suddenly flies in through the car window and attacks the detective
Katie jumps out from behind Barbara
A sudden loud noise startles Barbara
The bird suddenly flies out of the darkness and screeches
Barbara approaches Katie, and she suddenly turns around to reveal her face is distorted
